name: You Are Ghost
summary:
NEW UPDATE ALERT 🚨👻

You Are Ghost just dropped out of Early Access! 🔥 

HUB with upgrades + full ghost drip 💀✨ and Heist Mode where you steal from Grandpa! 

The haunting just got wild!

👻 Play as a Ghost – Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!

{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where you become a mischievous spirit in a haunted house full of secrets, challenges, and hilarious scares. 

Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles,...
